outputs.output_descr:
This project aims at establishing and operationalizing six district business solution centres, fast-tracking the establishment of the national council of small enterprises and strengthening and positioning three institutions to support micro, small and medium enterprises.

To achieve these planned outputs, the project will facilitate business planning processes and institutionalizing operational guidelines for each of the district business solution centres, establishing business information systems and networking for nine district business solution centres including facilitating delivery of selected, highly specialized high impact business development services to micro, small and medium enterprises, developing mechanisms for coordination of business solution centres by national council for small enterprises; and conducting institutional audit and re-focusing micro, small and medium enterprises to support strategies and training of staff of Kenya industrial Estates, Kenya Industrial Research and Development Institute and the Kenya Investment Authority.
